definition: Punjab state of India/Punjab province of Pakistan
one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)
to cover up (a shortcoming)/to screen off/to hide/to conceal
Punjab state in northwest India bordering Pakistan

sentences.english: But life is hard for many Punjabis.
sentences.chinese: 但时，对大多数旁遮普人来说，生活很艰难。

sentences.english: He is also the president of 'Friends of China Association' of Punjab.
sentences.chinese: 他是旁遮普邦“中国之友协会”的会长。

sentences.english: Many of the worshippers were from the neighboring state of Punjab.
sentences.chinese: 很多朝圣者来自临近的旁遮普邦。

sentences.english: Ghazi is to be buried in his ancestral village in Punjab province.
sentences.chinese: 加齐将被葬在旁遮普省他的老家。

sentences.english: Flood victims take refuge on high grounds in Pakistan's Rajanpur district in Punjab province, on Aug. 15, 2010.
sentences.chinese: 日，在巴基斯坦旁遮普省，人们在高地躲避洪水。

sentences.english: Some moved on to urban centres in Punjab and Sindh provinces.
sentences.chinese: 很多人转移到旁遮普省和信德省的中心地区。

sentences.english: I predict IPM will be accepted in the whole Punjab.
sentences.chinese: 我估计IPM会被旁遮普全省接受。

sentences.english: Once there came in this way a young Panjabi servant named Lenu.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，他带回一个年轻的旁遮普仆人名叫里努。

sentences.english: Well, he was the governor of Punjab.
Punjab officials said more than 200 people in the province have been arrested.
sentences.chinese: 旁遮普省官员说，该省有200多人被逮捕。

sentences.english: Curries are a pan-Asian phenomenon, being cooked almost everywhere between the Punjab and Japan.
sentences.chinese: 从印度旁遮普到日本，咖喱菜在亚洲随处可见。

sentences.english: Free meals and lodging are provided by this madrassa in Gujranwala in northeastern Punjab.
sentences.chinese: 旁遮普东北部古吉兰瓦拉伊斯兰学校提供免费食宿。

sentences.english: The Sikh challenge in the Punjab has dissipated.
sentences.chinese: 旁遮普邦锡克族的挑战已不构成威胁。

definition: Punjab state in northwest India bordering Pakistan
Tamil Nadu, southeast Indian state, capital Chennai 欽奈|钦奈[Qin1 nai4]/formerly Madras state 馬德拉斯邦|马德拉斯邦[Ma3 de2 la1 si1 bang1]
pinyin: Tai4 mi3 er3 Na4 de2 bang1

definition: Ladakh, the eastern part of Jammu and Kashmir in northwest India, adjacent to Kashmir and Tibet, know as "Little Tibet"
